name: Saturday Night Shift
description:
Controls -

W/A/S/D -  To walk

LMB - To click tasks

Each night, our faithful KRONA-19 immune employee braves the dangers of the Reykjavik nightlife by managing the nightclub all by himself. However, KRONA-19 has also taken out the repairmen and the maintenance, so he has to make sure that everything stays intact. Timed tasks demand his immediate attention, but when everything is breaking down at once, he has to decide which tasks to do first. But plot twist! The tasks are super challenging (/s) minigames! If the bar is out of stock, the speakers refuse to speak, the toilets are clogged, and nothing is working, his customers will be horribly unsatisfied and unleash the true power of BlippAdvisor on his beloved nightclub - which would surely only lead to ruin./s
